content.detailedDescription:
I have a video i would like to send from plane i was in flying over the caribbean. when i was videoing i never say its only after replay did i see this object. im sure it could be anything but i look at lots of video & shows on alien ships & i know with my all my faith that there out there so maybe you can tell me if i really caught one on video if not i'll keep looking to the sky until i do !!

thank-you for your time
andy

p.S. ist at the 5,6,7 sec.Mark of video it comes in at upper right corner
content.summary: Moved very fast, black disc shape looked to me!

content.detailedDescription:
At the time i took the picture, i was on a foot tour around washington dc detailing the events of the assassination of abraham lincoln. we came to the a street corner, i don't remember the exact street, and i saw a good photo opportunity with the capitol building, the moon, and a clock tower all in the background of the photo. i took 3 photos, and my parents took a few more as well. however, only one of those photos contained lights. at the time that i took the picture, i didn't even notice it, and just continued on with the tour. 
on the car ride back from the tour, i was looking through my photos and noticed these 5 lights in a v-formation above the capitol building. i had no idea what they were, i can't think of anything that would cause a light pattern like that besides maybe military planes? because i didn't even notice them in the first place, i was only able to go off of the picture, and i have no information on the objects' motions or actions.
content.summary: Hovering lights above the capitol building

content.detailedDescription:
My brothers were out moving sprinkler lines on my dad's property and saw three orange orbs flying around the property.

i did not witness the event, however, my brothers all saw these ufos and they would not all lie about this sort of occurrence.

lakeview, oregon has high/moderate ufo activity.

date: estimate, not actual.
content.summary: 3 orbs.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I work on sundays and was preparing to leave for work. i noticed in the sky a dark dot, which i thought could be a balloon or nothing important.
few minutes later, i looked at it again and saw it ascend in a very unusual way, kinda like a jellyfish swimming, then it stopped again. decided to grab my binoculars and take a look. at first when i observed the object it seemed like an upside down v. there were clouds nearby that seemed to project shadow on the object. i had to give attention to my dog for a couple minutes. when i observed the object again it seemed closer, and out of the cloud's shadow. now it looked like a gray colored triangle with a white round bottom. my wife saw it too, but she didn't want to look at the binoculars. it wobbled, then went hovering from right to left and entered a nearby cloud. after that i had to leave and could not observe the object anymore. i researched all similar sightings i could find and the most similar to what i saw was one sighting from kassel, germany on june 26, 2014. that really looks like to what i saw that day. decided to report to mufon after that. sending the picture of the germany sighting for reference. could not take a picture with my cellphone, the object would not seem to appear.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with white round bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
This was not my sighting but a lady on a website that buys/sells 2nd hand articles in spain, photographed them this afternoon on her mobile.

she posted them and asked if anyone else had seen them but so far no response...
content.summary: Fleet of 7 objects against vegetation

content.detailedDescription: Standing on the 9th floor of my hotel room around 9 pm i notice 5 ufo traveling north above the beach near the ocean.  i video the event with my iphone. after a few minutes i notice they turn east and up into the clouds. my hotel room was facing east oceanside. i do not believe they were helicopters or planes by the way they were moving and how quickly they turn 90 degrees so quickly. the videos will backup my statment.
content.summary: 5 ufo traveling north

content.detailedDescription: It was between the year 1977 and 1978, during the time i was a teenager, i was residing in the southeast side of houston, texas when the incident occurred; i was not into the ufo documentary stuff at that time nor believed in other worlds existing; just being a 70s teenager. one evening during the aforementioned time, it may have been anywhere between the time of 9:30pm and 10:30 pm hours, my mother told me to run down the roadway to the local store to purchase some items she had needed immediately for cooking; the store was about a half of block down the street east of my residence. i don't remember what time i had left that even exactly, however, it was at least before the local 10 o clock evening news had broadcast that night. i immediately proceeded out of my residence, onto the residential area roadway and proceeded on foot east bound to the store and crossed over a main roadway, in which the store was located. upon arrival at the store, which the walk to the store only took approximately 3 to 5 minutes from my home, i immediately purchased the items my mother requested, therefore, i was in and out the front door of the store in approximately 5 minutes, crossed over the main roadway and was on my residential street in seconds. a few minutes later, while proceeding west bound on my residential roadway and just arriving in front of my residence, something caught my attention which i found very odd that evening hour. next to my residence, west of it, there was a large open vacant lot between my residence and the next house west of mine at that time, which stretched north to the next street over, therefore, i could clearly see the next street over north from my residence. again, something odd caught my eye, i remembering observing what appeared to be some unidentified vehicle proceeding through a dark residential street west bound at a very high rate of speed, based on my current experience, it was traveling at least 70 mph in a 25 mph residential area, passing parked cars on that small roadway with no head lights on what so ever. i found that to be odd and i remember saying this to my self out loud, "why is he driving so fast like that and no head lights!"  seconds later, while still stunned by this vehicle's actions, something caught my attention that would haunt me for the rest of my life up to the time of this report, from out of thin air west of me over my residential roadway, this hugh ufo or some kind of craft appeared from out of thin air about a 45 degree angle of my site south of the vehicle's travel. this was not some point of light in the sky or anything, this thing was very very large, humongous hugh! it was approximately the size of a football field. at that time, frozen in fear in my tracks, i observed this object about approximately 100 feet from the roadway and approximately 100 to 125 feet from me. therefore, i was close enough to the point if i would have turned my back to the ufo and had thrown a rock at it over my shoulder, i confidently know i would have hit it; that's how close i was to it. the most frightening thing about the whole incident, that for it to be so close to me, so humongous in size that it slowly moved without making a sound; totally silent! it moved from over my street north to a north easternly direction over the open vacant lot towards the roadway of where the mysterious traveling vehicle was last seen. slowly and smoothly glided and it appeared that it was almost traveling towards me. i was so frighten and immediately panicked, thinking that who ever was operating that ufo was coming to get me. i ran up to our closed chain link fence and not sure if i leaped over it our opened it, however, afterwards, i remembering running up to the porch and frantically trying to open the closed and locked exterior aluminum glass front door, jerking on it frantically and yelling open the door. i remember my sister, who was next to me in age approaching the door from inside the living room, unlocked it and opened the door and asking me in a smart sarcastic way, like sister and brother were, "what's wrong with you boy!". i burst right into that living room, scared like nothing before and nothing since up to the time of this report. i remember going into the kitchen and i think my mom asked me "where have you been and why it has it taken so long to go to the store." i was speechless and had yet to respond to either my sister's question nor my mom. i was to shook up to talk. a few minutes passed, still shook up from the incident and had not told anyone what i had witnessed, i proceeded to my bedroom and was casually in front of my 13 inch black and white television and the local news was broadcasting. the weather man was on the television, which was approximately 10:25 pm , sarcastically  stated that a ufo had been spotted in the houston area. my question is, was i abducted or part of a missing time incident? was the traveling vehicle in question part of all this? i have to say, i don't remember seeing any lights on this large object in question. all i can say is that it was approximately the size of a football field, shaped either chevron or rectangular. this object did not make a sound, absolutely at all; totally silent while it moved across the air! therefore, it had a high degree of technology that i have never seen before and yet up to the time of this report. it was not a blimp or any air craft i have ever seen in my life time. if that's military of the us or any country, that country would rule the world with that kind of technology; appearing out of thin air and moving across the air without sound,  compulsion or some kind of exhaust. in addition, i have had many other incidents in my life so have other family members experiencing things that violated laws of physics that were unexplained such as missing time, appearing from one location of the city to another location miles away in a blink of an eye. i wonder if this is all connected.
content.summary: The ufo appeared from thin air. has it moved made no sound and was about the size of a football field and glided from southwest to northeast

content.detailedDescription: Every dog in the neighborhood is awake. i need help please
content.features: Patterned Surface, Insignia, Appendage(s), Wings, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Send someone with a camera and a great microphone. i'm visited daily...Freaked out as we speak, computer keeps freezing

content.detailedDescription: While out fishing with a relative at about 1:30 am asked what is that. when i turned in the direction he was looking i seen nothing i was looking too high. then very low in the sky i seen six objects coming out of the north in a very straight line going very fast they where, glowing a very bright emerald, green color. but you could still tell they had a solid structure to them. then as the first one hit a certain point, it shot straight up leaving a green streak or tail behind it. as each one hit that very same spot it did the same thing, all leaving a streak or tail behind them. and they where gone!! we live in a very active area plains and jets helicopters, and the person i was with is a very reliable person  with air craft knowledge. we had no idea what they where, we where stunned, by what we had just seen.
content.summary: Fishing with a relative

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to burney ca . for christmas,i turned on to winters freeway to cut accross to highway 5, it was about 8;30 to 9 pm ,when i saw this  object out in the field to my right shinning these flat lights up and down and sideways they were bright and white,for some reason i started hitting my high and low beams as i drove by it,,then suddenly it over the top of my pinto shinning the lights through my wind sheald and back window lighting the inside of the car up,i became scared,my heart pounding like in my throat,i went as fast as the car could go,then suddenly,i calmed down,was smiling and happy,my wife at the time seemed unawhere and staring straght ahead,i then pulled over and got out of the car and there it was no more than 5 feet above my car,i stood there looking at this retanglar craft,dark grey with three big lights in front that had little flat beams of light shinning out of them,,it looked about 5 to 6 feet thick 15 to 20 feet long , no windows i could see,i walked to the back of the craft,as i walked i wanted to toutch it,but somthing told me not to in my head so i didnt,when i got to the back i saw two 2 foot fins and a steady bolt of electricty writhing between them they were about three feet apart,i thought that was the propulsion system,then suddenly i was leaning aginst the passenger side of the car looking at the craft out in the field about 50 feet away,big lights on the front,shinning flat beam out of them, i then got into the car and drove off,feeling sad almost in tears,not knowing why,we didnt talk about it,we should have been at our destination by 10 pm we didnt get there till almost two in the morning.
content.summary: Chased by retanglar craft lighting car inside,scared then not

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a evening ride,drinking coffee listening to a broadcast.
on a rural country road,when to the left of the car across a field,i wittnesed a unusually bright light in the western sky,i was going to turn around to get a better look but, i knew their was another field 4 times as big as the one i just passed about 300 yards ahead and i could get a better look there.As i approached the next field and it came into view, i could see this bright light clearly. it was so bright it made me see in blurry double vision and squint,i said to myself this is no star its too low to bright.I pulled to the side of road shut off car to see if i could hear anything from it, i could not,i watched it  waiting for movement anything but it stayed stationary with its super bright light, then i thought of my cell phone turned and grabbed it from the dash of my car,then i had the idea of turning on my phones flash light and flashed it to see if i could get a reaction,bad idea the damn thing dimmed a little and started to move.I turned off the light, double tapped the home button for the camera to start and as, i did the light got bright again and it started moving real fast towards me too fast. i snapped pictures in succession 5 of them!"the first being small because of the distance but at the end of the 5th pic it was almost on top of me, that"s when i began to freak out.I just watched it come in my direction with marked anticipation,i didn't know what was going to happen,all i could see at first was the bright white light of what i assumed was the front of the craft still no noise and it was close,i could not make out a shape yet because the light was so bright,as it was almost over the top of me, and the car, a little to the left side this is where it starts to take shape kinda like a broad arrow tip, in front to a half diamond shape in the back of craft with solid exterior lights blue, red, and green.And as it flew right over me approximetly 100 to 150 feet their was a low vibrating buzz or humm, at this point my heart was racing. i was already panicked but it passed over me headed west, north west, and disappeared behind the trees on the right side of the road.This is when i made my move and got the h e double tooth pics out of their.I kept watching the sky but never caught site of it again.
content.summary: Riding in car saw bright light over field stioped observed it  flashed it with light it took pics

content.detailedDescription:
I've reported about entities in my room before but this time they seem to have affected every thing electronic in my room when it came. it was about 8 foot tall and about 4-5 feet away. the time of the occurrence was around 1pm, my watch stopped at that time. it stood there for between 3-5 minutes before turning around and slowly vanishing. once again, my dog did not react to it being in the room and the other dogs that i now live with didn't react either. i did not see anything that looked like a craft when i looked outside nor did i see what looked like a landing area. my cell phone hasn't been able to hold a charge all day and went from about a 90% charge (had been off the charger for 2 hours) to a "critical" charge (less than 10%) just over the time frame of the entity being in my room.

the entity was a dark green, almost black, with vertical pupils and yellow colored eyes. it had 3 ridges on it's head, one down the center and one on each side just over where the ears would be. its mouth looked somewhat like a muzzle but was more blunt and wide. it wore a tan colored uniform with grey stripes down the sides of the pants and in insignia that looked like two triangles pointing at each other at the tops.
content.summary: Entity in bedroom

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:30ish tonight 8/31/15, i was walking from my apartment to the dumpster when i notice a very large goldish light moving pretty fast in the sky. it was really bright and didn't blink once so i stopped and gazed at it. the thing was booking across the sky, then once it hit the horizon it took off then faded away. i then continued minding my own business and headed towards the trash.  on my way back to the building i caught a shine in the corner of my left eye. i turn my head only, what i imagen was the same golden object, only closer, much closer. this i could make out what looked to be a white or shinning metallic surface. it had an even brighter center which seemed translucent. in my head, my thoughts go from amazement to fear as i thought it was at a tractor beam of the sorts. either way i didn't stick around to find out. i took off into the building and entered my apartment in a panic, even freaked out my girlfriend
content.summary: Too much detail

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:00 p.M. on august 31st, 2015 i saw two unusually shaped objects in the sky.  this is within 5 miles of a naval air station, however i don't believe this could have been anything familiar.  the crafts were identical, both consisting of two tightly connected or tethered white spheres. they rotated around each other and moved lazily through a small patch of sky.  at the time, i was taking my son to the playground, so i only saw the craft hovering around each other for perhaps 45 seconds, and was then distracted by other children trying to take my son's ball.  30 seconds later the craft were gone, and i didn't see them again for the next 45 minutes that i was outside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two crafts, each consisting of two connected white spheres, hovering

content.detailedDescription: Me and my three friends were walking to my house and noticed orange like stars moving at a medium speed shaped like a giant kite then it disappeared! then i tried to take a picture my phone wouldnt work when they were gone it worked
content.summary: Me and my three friends were walking to my house and noticed orange like stars moving at a medium speed shaped like a giant kite then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the back yard, i saw the sky and saw a rare object silver that changed the direction quickly and i went to take my camera, when i return the object was very high in the sky and take the photo in the last direction that i saw. you must near the photo to see this object like a ovni to me. i'm salvadorean, sorry with my english, i hope you understand me, i prefer you answer me in spanish. i like all to relations with ovnis. i saw your programs tv.
my congratulations to yours.

sincerely,

amado francia
altos del palmar, calle gonzaga, 
pol. 1, block d, no. 6
santa ana, el salvador, 
centro america
content.summary: The object plane in the sky and ascend to the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I live east of batesville ms. my husband and i just observed in the southern sky an object of which the lights changed colors from orange to white to yellow to blue, with another light that occasionally blinked on around it. the object moved in tight circles, then up, down, half circle, left, right. it was there when we came in. i took my camera out but the lens is not strong enough to pick the object up well. quite an experience!! i was originally out to just observe the constellations because i am trying to learn them. the object caught my eye because at first i thought it was an airplane, until i noticed the erratic movements and the changing colors. funny thing is, my husband observed it with me, and he is a huge ufo skeptic!!
when i first noticed the object, i thought it was an airplane, until the movements were inconsistent with any craft i've ever witnessed. there was an airplane crossing the sky from sw to ne, it's path was below the object i was seeing. at first i thought it was a star, and i was out trying to spot any constellations, because i am trying to learn them when i see them.
as i said, my husband is a big skeptic, and he kept trying to explain it, but watching its erratic movements, and changing lights, he ran out of explanations. he finally decided he had no idea what it could be, and stopped watching. i stood and watched for another 10 minutes before i came in the house seeing i couldn't video it anyway. i am about to go back out and see if it is still there.
yes, but it has changed its location, it is now more west but still moving, now from east to west about 5 foot taking into account the distance i am viewing. lights still changing.
i have duties inside, i will check back on it later.
content.summary: Lights and erratic movements in southern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not sure if you'd be interested in my story as it's 40 years old. in any event, back when i was 10 years old, myself and three friends temporarily borrowed a neighbor's row boat for a bit of a joy ride out on the lake (maynard's lake in dartmouth, nova scotia) upon returning the boat, i happened to look over my left shoulder where my attention was immediately drawn to a bright glow out in the middle of the lake. what was odd was we didn't hear or see anything land and a minute prior there was nothing there!!  i said to my friends "what the heck is that?" what we all saw was two brightly glowing orange sphere's. they were side by side with the one on the right sat just in front of the left one and overlapped it by approximately 50 to 60 percent. they were identical in height (30-35 feet high). they sat there on the water i suppose you could call it hovering so the very bottom of the sphere's just kissed the water's surface, all the while making no sound of engines or propulsion systems of any kind. what was odd was the sphere's glowed but did not cast light as to light up the area, they just seemed to glow from within. after observing for a minute or two and getting the hell scared out of us we paddled as fast as we could back to shore and almost to the shore i noticed the sphere on the right shot straight up which was immediately followed by the left one. after ascending to a few hundred feet, they both instantly shot off about 75-80 degrees to the right at a blinding speed and had completely disappeared within a few seconds. we never told our parents in fear of getting in trouble for "borrowing" the neighbor's boat without their knowledge. not much else for details but it happened exactly as i mentioned here.
content.summary: Witnessed 2 bright orange glowing spheres that hoverd on the lake's water surface

content.detailedDescription: I have always been fascinated with stars as far back as i can remember. one summer night at about ten at night, i thought i would go out and look at the sky and i looked toward the south east i saw red lights in the woods. the unusual thing about these lights is they were twenty to thirty feet high. we are talking about as high as the tallest trees which were twenty to thirty feet tall. the lights took the shape of a christmas tree, from the top to the bottom, all red lights. we are talking about hundreds of lights. by the time i went and got one of my brothers, the object was gone. the object was about three to four hundred yards away. it could not be mistaken for any thing else. there was no noise or any type of electrical wires to say that some-one had hooked any lights to the trees. it is a clearing in the woods and in the middle of no where. maybe it doesn't mean anything, just thought i would share. if you are interested there are two more sighting and locations for all. this is not a story or a prank.
content.summary: Chritmas tree shape object

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my dog in the back yard looking up at the sky like i usually do. it was a clear night and i could see the stars crystal clearly. i noticed a bright and small light what's thought was the space station. but it was a solid light and moving very fast. then i saw it make a 90* turn to the north. at this height it looked to be in low earth orbit. then i watched it til it faded out of view. the other object came along not 2 minutes later in the same direction. but this one was a little brighter and actually faded out. 

i live near an airport and an air force base and have seen planes flyin overhead. these two objects behaved like nothing i've ever seen. i was and still am amazed at what i saw. this is my first report to mufon. i will gladly be available if you have any questions.
content.summary: Saw two different lights several miles up

content.detailedDescription: 9/12/14 @ 5:55am i was on break at work saw a light in the distance then appeared above us along the mountin side made no noise just hoverd there was clouds coming out from bottom it was a clear night no clouds except the one pluming out from the bottom of craft i could see the middle and top of the craft the top was silver and had a band of light around the middle of the craft a brighter light then came out from the band of light and scaned from left to right then right to left then dissapeard leaving a circle cloud then apeard a mile or two to the west scaned agin then dissappeard agin leaving a circle cloud it was so close i know it wasint a case of miss identification i could see the object and i have never seen any thing like it i have looked online found a couple of videos but thers shot from far away and it was on the news the news tryed to pass it off as a comet/meteor or pace junk or even a missle it was seen from new mexico to oregon i saw it at 5:55 am reports in oregon at 6:am nothing man made could move that fast i saw the object up close and it was not a comet/meteor/space junk it was somthing not from this world i belived before but after seeing that it has changed my life
content.summary: Pluming clounds from under silver rounded disck with band of light in the middle

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness this, a friend did.  she said people were pulling over on the highway to watch them.  route 322 in chichester pa. orange orbs.
content.summary: Multiple orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was photographing our full, august moon.  experimenting with various distances and exposures.  after taking about 35 pictures, i came in the house to load them on my imac....In looking at the photos enlarged, i saw the disc in the one photo i took without using a zoom. i didn't see the object before, during, or after photographing the moon. i went outside to see what it might have been but nothing made sense.  while i'm not believing i saw a ufo, i assume this would be the organization most likely to tell me what i'm seeing in the photo.
content.summary: I was photographing the moon. didn't see this until i uploaded the pics.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard pacing east, saw the orb bright orange in color come from the se towards nw at a steady speed. it would tend to slow down at certain points then resume speed. the bright orange color maintained its brightness and color the whole time. before it got over my neighborhood, i went in the house and out the back door to continue watching it, anticipating the flight path went over the house (neighborhood)as i looked around (it only took me 10 seconds to get to backyard through the house) the light was gone. i looked in all directions north, south, weast and west and it was no longer to be seen. i even looked in the direction it would have continued onto but still nothing.
content.summary: Bright orange orb with no flashing lights or sound, then disappeared once it approached west tucson

content.detailedDescription: My sister yelled for me to come outside and when i got our there i looked up to my right and saw a starlight flame floating slow moving round. i walked down the sidewalk and kept a visual as it went probably 1mile and decended out of view behind a ridge. my niece got home from work about 1145 and we were talking and i told her about what we had seen earlier and as we were talking, my sister started yelling for us from out front. we both jumped up and my niece had her phone and therein the sky was a similar looking object in the sky with the same kind of movement heading in the same direction. i watched it go up and down until it just vanished. there was a cpl of times that it vanished and then reappeared. the video i sent in is what my niece had captured on her phone
content.summary: We saw something simaliar about 2 hrs before but had no camere then we were out front talking about it and another appeared that my niece filmed on her phone

content.detailedDescription: I have filled a full report out and submitted it to this web site already,since then i have created this image of what i saw in the summer of 1965 along with  my brother john and a friend mike kaufman. it was mike's house we visited and when we got out of the car this is what we saw, just as you see it rotating counter clockwise and not making a sound, shortly after a few minutes from all the fuss we were making there were at least two dozen people came out of there homes to see what all this was over.We all remained in shock,after a ten minute period it started to move towards new york city to the west,at first very slowly gradually picking up speed at the same altitude as i tracked it down to a spec in the sky all at once it came right back to the same spot in seconds right over mike's back yard never changing it's altitude. then it flipped over and was inverted when it did this all the people had enough and there was panic in the street all the people ran back in there homes screaming in panic. mike's mother called the nassau county police and while this was going on they told us it was a collage prank and didn't even bother to come out and fill out a report. it eventually headed back towards the city and we never saw it again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It looked the same on top as on bottom a sauser shape all metallic with a black band aroun d it

content.detailedDescription:
A few years ago, i had woken startled, but relieved to be in my own bed.  i had very vivid memories of the occurrence that had just happened.  i had been examined by beings and returned home.  this recollection gave a full understanding that this was one of many 'abductions'.  i hesitate with that term, since i didn't feel i was there against my will, and was very familiar with one of the beings, almost like an old friend.  the routine examine was completed and at some point i was walking around the ship with this 'old friend' we talked [through telepathy] and discussed many topics, some that regarded humankind and the future for us and our planet.  this discussion we had feels as if it was of great importance.  however, i cannot remember the details.  i was visited again several days later.  there were at least two different species.  there were beings that were similar to what are described as greys.  i felt a small sense of hierarchy that the taller ones were superior to the shorter ones.  not certain if they were juveniles to adults or different classes.  the second vivid memory there were hybrid like shorter beings with bright blue eyes and blond hair, the taller greys were present.  again, the 'old friend' was among the group.
 
i am not certain why they allowed me to remember these few details of these visitations.  i feel like i need to revisit this conversation with the 'old friend' because it stressed importance.  if you would like to discuss this in greater detail i am open to conversation.  there may be many questions than can be answered.  


most recently, i had a sensation that another occurrence may happen that evening.  strange sensation that they were in the room as i prepared for bed, but i could not see anything, but felt they were present.  oddly, it felt like 'he' -the 'old friend' or familiar being was there.  the next day i felt like my left eye had been stabbed with a needle or something.  more painful than debris in my eye.  on my drive to work i became increasingly sensitive to light, to the point that a beautiful sunny day had become painful and blinding.  i did not have a headache/migraine or history of migraines and have not experienced this before.  nausea and blurred vision are also symptoms. 


i would be very open to regressive hypnosis to recall these occurrences and specific conversation.  i hope to have more clarity to these instances.


thank you for your time and understanding.

best regards,
a.-
content.summary: Abduction / examination  -this was a reoccurrence as i later realized

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Decided to go out side and stare up for no reason. out of now where a bright object appeared above tree line and was flying for 20 seconds or so with a bright white light. the light was bright to the point that nothing could be made out. then it disappeared the moon was out no clouds.
content.summary: Bright light seemed round no clouds appeared out of no where and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Due to a severe car accident and related back pain, i often sleep poorly. this morning, my (then) girlfriend was annoyed i hadn't come to bed on valentine's day night. so to give her space, i retired to my basement workshop for distraction. upon figuring out a final design for a forward grip replacement for an inherited israeli rifle, i stepped out side, walking up an exterior stair case from my basement to back yard, for a cigarette. it was a chilly morning, somewhere between 28° and 36° fahrenheit according to the weather underground's almanac. i was distracted spray painting metal pieces on my back porch, facing the house, when the distant chop of helicopter blades became audible. since the michael brown riots helicopters are common place all night. even at this time however, we were in a direct departure path from lambert international airport, and commonly overflown by life flight, police, and news choppers, as well as the occasional more exotic military aircraft. we live close to scott air force base, and close enough to whiteman afb that a ch-47, uh-60, or even occasional fighter isn't uncommon. certainly not enough to raise concern. i have seen lockheed f117 nighthawks, tankers, and cargo planes perhaps on the order of one each, every 18 months. i have also been overflown by a squadron of a-10 thunderbolts, screaming across lake of the ozarks at about 100 feet off the deck. this night, after a few moments of sound, an "aerial convoy" came visible low above the horizon, to the south, much closer than the propeller sound i heard indicated. i have family in the nga and at a family day saw one come in, land, and depart. the flight group made little noise, and what i did hear only accounted for two of the aircraft. fore and aft were uh60 blackhawk helicopters. they had only green lights visible to me, north of aircraft, as it traveled east to west across the sky to my south. almost every military flight i've seen from here was to the north and traveling east. between the two blackhawks was a black craft reminiscent of a combination of a swept wing f22-like concept and a f117 stealth fighter. it made no noise audible over helicopters, and would have had to have been max throttle to not fall from sky. the plane had a vertical stabilizer, but no anti collision beacon/strobe. it had no navigation lights either, limiting any illumination of the fuselage. no windows were visible, but that's not to say it wasn't there. the plane was geometrically comparable do to proximity to the uh60s. it was marginally longer than the 65' helos, at maybe 75 feet long. beneath the fuselage was a radiant heat distortion akin to hot pavement on a summer day. this presented as a translucent, slightly light-refracting haze. when i dipped inside to grab my binoculars, i pulled my phone off the charger for its camera. it was at about 17%. i scanned the craft for insignia but neither type had any. i took out my phone and opened the camera app, at which point the phone rebooted twice and died. the battery has never quite been the same. i feel any jet turbine engine would be far below alpha max speed traveling at under 75 miles an hour, and would inevitably stall. two sac flight mechanics i spoke to emphatically agreed, assuming i hadn't just seen an f-35 but circumstances make a hovering billion dollar plane over south saint louis seem unlikely. it was suggested that maybe i keep this to myself. even though i believe this to be secret usaf merchandise, i think it suggests capabilities often associated with ufos. i'm no skeptic, but in my case i report this to perhaps rule out extraneous sightings of earth-borne tech.
content.summary: Delta wing air force-looking craft accompanied by a uh60 blackhawk for and aft. blackhawks had green lights. plane had no anti collision beacon or nav lights. tracked across southern sky. approx speed below alpha max for plane.
content.locationName: Within St. Louis City Lim, Missouri

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were leaving to return back to our car which was parked in the parking lot. we were with another couple. we had just attended the waterfire in providence, ri. as were just about to get into our car, i decided to take a picture of the city skyline. i took several shots with my iphone, and the next day posted it on fb. it was then, that it was noticed that there were lights in the picture. a row of lights...Over 10..Very tiny. but almost in a straight line. it was pretty high up in the sky. it's just a straight line of tiny lights. i looked at the other previous shots that i took and there were no lights. the other people that were with us also took the same shots, and he also had the lights show up in one of his shots. i can't think of any explanation for this. it is a single shot, over the city.
content.summary: I took this picture with my iphone from a city parking lot.
